title: Annual Cricket Day
description: A full day of thrilling cricket matches, skill contests, and celebrations.

title: Inter-School Cricket Championship
description: Our school cricket team competes with top teams from across the city.

title: Friendly Cricket Match
description: A friendly cricket match to promote sportsmanship, unity, and team spirit.

title: Inter-House Cricket Tournament
description: Different houses compete in an exciting cricket tournament for the school trophy.

title: Cricket Skills Training Camp
description: A dedicated cricket camp to improve batting, bowling, and fielding skills.

title: State-Level Cricket Championship
description: Our best players represent the school in a prestigious state-level cricket event.
